rss.channel: Apache Traffic Server™ Downloads Release feed for Apache Traffic Server™ http://trafficserver.apache.org/downloads en-us igalic@apache.org Current (stable) Release 3.2.4 25-01-2013 http://www.apache.org/dyn/closer.cgi/trafficserver/trafficserver-3.2.4.tar.bz2 Current (stable) Release Traffic Server 3.2.4 This is a bug-fix release, but we've also made a number of improvements, in particular on FreeBSD. If you are upgrading from the previous stable releases (v3.0.x), please see [these instructions](https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/TS/Upgrading+to+3.2). http://www.apache.org/dyn/closer.cgi/trafficserver/trafficserver-3.2.4.tar.bz2 25-01-2013 Legacy (stable) Release 3.0.5 06-06-2012 http://www.apache.org/dyn/closer.cgi/trafficserver/trafficserver-3.0.5.tar.bz2 Legacy (stable) Release Traffic Server 3.0.5 http://www.apache.org/dyn/closer.cgi/trafficserver/trafficserver-3.0.5.tar.bz2 06-06-2012 Current (developer, unstable) Release 3.3.1 14-03-2013 http://www.apache.org/dyn/closer.cgi/trafficserver/trafficserver-3.3.1-dev.tar.bz2 Current (developer, unstable) Release Traffic Server 3.3.1 http://www.apache.org/dyn/closer.cgi/trafficserver/trafficserver-3.3.0-dev.tar.bz2 07-09-2012 Archived (stable) Release 3.2.0 19-06-2012 http://archive.apache.org/dist/trafficserver/trafficserver-3.2.0.tar.bz2 Archived (stable) Release Traffic Server 3.2.0 More details are also in the [CHANGES log](https://git-dual.apache.org/repos/asf?p=trafficserver.git;a=blob;f=CHANGES;h=b70108ada22f0b8872fbca218bcf09b2f3692c99;hb=f80179bce9133048d7d28cef59b4deb7adc22d20). http://archive.apache.org/dist/trafficserver/trafficserver-3.2.0.tar.bz2 19-06-2012 Archived (stable) Release 3.0.4 07-12-2011 http://archive.apache.org/dist/trafficserver/trafficserver-3.0.4.tar.bz2 Archived (stable) Release Traffic Server 3.0.4 More details are also in the [CHANGES log](https://git-dual.apache.org/repos/asf?p=trafficserver.git;a=blob;f=CHANGES;h=b70108ada22f0b8872fbca218bcf09b2f3692c99;hb=f80179bce9133048d7d28cef59b4deb7adc22d20). For details on the fixes since v2.0.0, please refer to the [bug list](v2tov3bugs.html). http://archive.apache.org/dist/trafficserver/trafficserver-3.0.4.tar.bz2 07-12-2011 Archived (stable) Release 3.0.2 07-12-2011 http://archive.apache.org/dist/trafficserver/trafficserver-3.0.2.tar.bz2 Archived (stable) Release Traffic Server 3.0.2 More details are also in the [CHANGES log](). For details on the fixes since v2.0.0, please refer to the [bug list](v2tov3bugs.html). **Note:** Upgrading from v2.0.x or v2.1.8 and earlier requires that you migrate to the new records.config configuration file. You should also clear all caches after upgrading (e.g. `sudo traffic_server -Cclear`), as well as deleting the hostdb files (`var/trafficserver/host.db` and `etc/trafficserver/internal/hostdb.config`). http://archive.apache.org/dist/trafficserver/trafficserver-3.0.2.tar.bz2 07-12-2011 Archived (stable) Release 2.0.1 01-09-2010 http://archive.apache.org/dist/trafficserver/trafficserver-2.0.1.tar.bz2 Archived (stable) Release Traffic Server 2.0.1 * Port of CVE-2010-2952 for 2.0.x [[`TS-425`](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/TS-425)] * Backport part of TS-322 that deals with indexing arrays with char (author: Marcus Ruckert) [[`TS-334`](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/TS-334)] * Backport TS-336 to 2.0.x. Problems with make install DESTDIR http://archive.apache.org/dist/trafficserver/trafficserver-2.0.1.tar.bz2 01-09-2010 Archived (developer, unstable) Release 3.1.3 21-03-2012 http://archive.apache.org/dist/trafficserver/trafficserver-3.1.3-unstable.tar.bz2 Archived (developer, unstable) Release Traffic Server 3.1.3 More details are also in the [CHANGES log](https://git-dual.apache.org/repos/asf?p=trafficserver.git;a=blob;f=CHANGES;h=9fe84e12fbc75f8f5c2e56fda089622443c1fa74;hb=0f57f149b0a42798ca09e0f3ce77393a6acb0ec2). The Jira release notes are also [available](https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/ReleaseNote.jspa?projectId=12310963&version=12317969). This release fixes a vulnerability, [CVE-2012-0256](https://www.cert.fi/en/reports/2012/vulnerability612884.html), where a large Host: headers can potentially crash the server. All users of all unstable development releases are urged to upgrade to 3.1.3. This includes all 2..x and 3.1.x releases prior to v3.1.3. http://archive.apache.org/dist/trafficserver/trafficserver-3.1.3-unstable.tar.bz2 21-03-2012 Archived (developer, unstable) Release 3.1.2 08-02-2012 http://archive.apache.org/dist/trafficserver/trafficserver-3.1.2-unstable.tar.bz2 Archived (developer, unstable) Release Traffic Server 3.1.2 More details are also in the [CHANGES log](https://git-dual.apache.org/repos/asf?p=trafficserver.git;a=blob;f=CHANGES;h=b601cc7b8de241b7413006d50b31274f662c309b;hb=458454806b2e18230ec2a77d235e91d8682f651f). The Jira release notes are also [available](https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/ReleaseNote.jspa?projectId=12310963&version=12316496). http://archive.apache.org/dist/trafficserver/trafficserver-3.1.2-unstable.tar.bz2 08-02-2012 Archived (developer, unstable) Release 3.1.1 18-11-2011 http://archive.apache.org/dist/trafficserver/trafficserver-3.1.1-unstable.tar.bz2 Archived (developer, unstable) Release Traffic Server 3.1.1 More details are also in the [CHANGES log](https://git-dual.apache.org/repos/asf?p=trafficserver.git;a=blob;f=CHANGES;h=b9f3bb5a460334a44589b4346321510e5cf3f225;hb=54a0686ee2961cf4f3d55d63810c077fc902ef7c). http://archive.apache.org/dist/trafficserver/trafficserver-3.1.1-unstable.tar.bz2 18-11-2011 Archived (developer, unstable) Release 3.1.0 25-08-2011 http://archive.apache.org/dist/trafficserver/trafficserver-3.1.0-unstable.tar.bz2 Archived (developer, unstable) Release Traffic Server 3.1.0 More details are also in the [CHANGES log](https://git-dual.apache.org/repos/asf?p=trafficserver.git;a=blob;f=CHANGES;h=1bcde89481a6527e85c448781aa84b311e34aea1;hb=6a6a94f5668160fba6118ca08cd2dc5cdb37c542). http://archive.apache.org/dist/trafficserver/trafficserver-3.1.0-unstable.tar.bz2 25-08-2011
